forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 58F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.
